definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: You eyes are two pools that twinkle like starts in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 你的双眼是两汪清泉，就像那夜空中闪烁的星。

sentences.english: A lake of gold in the desert sand is less than a cool, fresh spring.
sentences.chinese: 沙漠中一湖的黄金也比不上一股清泉。

sentences.english: You are fountain of the metempsychosis on the golden string.
sentences.chinese: 你是轮回的清泉，在金色的玄线上。

sentences.english: Thirsty, drink a few mouthfuls of springs, sweet Toru bottom of my heart.
sentences.chinese: 渴了，喝上几口清泉，甜彻心底。

sentences.english: In the northeast corner, located Qing spring, it is the famous Rehe spring.
sentences.chinese: 东北角有清泉，即著名的热河泉。

sentences.english: It was not long before I came upon a natural well made of stones.
sentences.chinese: 不久我来到一口石头围成的天然清泉前。

sentences.english: And springs begin with small flakes of snow;
sentences.chinese: 片片雪花融成丝丝清泉。

sentences.english: A young man roaming the desert came across a spring.
sentences.chinese: 一个在沙漠中长途跋涉的年轻人经过一泓清泉。

sentences.english: Even more…A moon-like lake encompasses an oasis, and a Buddhist temple sits on the green.
sentences.chinese: 还有月牙一样的清泉，温婉地包绕着沙漠上的寺庙。

sentences.english: Begum was poisoned by the beautiful water she had faithfully pumped.
sentences.chinese: 贝根是被她终生信任而汲取的清泉所毒害。

sentences.english: Jean's grave inditing a cold spring edge, hugged her body.
sentences.chinese: 琴的坟边涌出一股清泉，拥抱着她的身体。

sentences.english: Shitoushan that is the legendary beast, the lion population has also kept out a clear head.
sentences.chinese: 狮头即是传说中的怪兽，狮口还不断喷出一股股清泉。

sentences.english: Japanese army prepared and trapped some main jerked a spring mountain positions.
sentences.chinese: 日军有备而来，晁猛地主力一团被困清泉山阵地。
